response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to revolutionize the way you operate in your field. This product is not just an item; it's a solution that can significantly enhance efficiency, productivity, and profitability. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value lies well beyond $1,200,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I am confident that once you experience the benefits firsthand, you will agree that this investment is invaluable. Let's discuss how we can bring this game-changing solution into your business.", "product_price": 1150000}
